Anya was asking about you, by the way. She’s up at the temple with Glennock and the other children, getting ready for the big sleep experiment today. I think Anya is feeling anxious about it. I know it’s a tremendous burden for the kids, and I think having you there might reassure her.

You should go up and see her, even if it’s only for a few moments.

Invited to join in a pre-experiment offering to Tiaran the Sorrow Tree, <PCNAME> was as surprised as anyone to see the tiny Tiaran sapling undergo a radical growth spurt… and for shimmering lights to surround the children. Informed by Glennock that this had never happened before, <PCNAME> set off with Anya to fetch some sap from the Mysterium’s storehouse, so that Glennock could perform some tests.

Oh, there you are, .

I was just explaining today’s experiment to the children. It’s important that they understand what an amazing gift the Sight is, and that their participation in these experiments is purely voluntary.

We were just about to make an offering to the spirit of Tiaran. Would you care to join us?
"I’d be honored."

When you're ready, pour some water on the Tiaran sapling here. The children will then perform the invocation to Tiaran.

That's really all there is to it. We are ready when you are."Okay."
